pr_title: Fix lots of spelling errors throughout yarn

timeline.message: Fix lots of spelling errors throughout yarn

timeline.bodyText:
This is not desync. It actually synchronizes the data to the disk as soon as it's written, by passing the StandardOpenOption.DSYNC option when opening the file. See this discussion when it was added:
#1253 (comment)
timeline.author: Runemoro
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -11,12 +11,12 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2861 net/minecraft/world/storage/RegionFile
 	METHOD <init> (Ljava/io/File;Ljava/io/File;Z)V
 		ARG 1 file
 		ARG 2 directory
-		ARG 3 dsync
+		ARG 3 desync

replies.bodyText: Guess we will fix this in some other pr later
replies.author: liach
